Kickstart a Neighborhood
Business in Minutes

Turn your skills into income. Connect with neighbors who need help with everyday tasks. Start earning today with our simple, secure platform.

Why Choose
Minor Chores?

We're more than just a platform.
We're your gateway to building a sustainable neighborhood business.
Together, we create opportunities that benefit everyone.

How Minor Chores Works

Download Minor Chores on IOS or Android, the first app for young entrepreneurs to start profitable neighborhood businesses safely.

01

Create Your Profile

Sign up with parental approval and showcase your skills. Add photos and set your availability.

02

Browse Local Jobs

Find tasks in your neighborhood that match your skills. Filter by distance, pay, and schedule.

03

Connect & Communicate

Chat with customers about job details. Ask questions and confirm expectations before starting.

04

Complete & Get Paid

Finish the job, get rated, and receive payment directly. Build your reputation in the community.

Chore-preneur

Minor Chores is a simple solution for busy households, enabling parents to quickly and safely teach kids essential business skills while building community.

Safety & Parental Controls

Easily monitor via in-app & SMS notifications, restricted job radius, job bookings, and more.

Instant Website to Share

Select from over 40 templates and pricing, and instantly start sharing your website.

Scan-to-Schedule Flyers

Print marketing flyers with your website QR code to easily acquire clients via SMS.

Customer List

See all your customers in one location and send broadcast SMS based on their needs.

Broadcast SMS Marketing

Send one text message to multiple customers to get more bookings.

Easy-to-Use Invoicing

Send invoices in-app or via SMS. Easily track earnings and build your resume.

Keep 100% of Profits

Our goal is to boost your earnings, not take them. Keep everything you earn.
